title: Google\Cloud\DataCatalog\V1\Schema
name: Schema
description:
Represents a schema, for example, a BigQuery, GoogleSQL, or Avro schema.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datacatalog.v1.Schema

params.name: data.columns
